com.philips.lighting.model

Interface PHBridgeResourcesCache


  • public interface PHBridgeResourcesCache
    This interface provides current lights, groups & bridge configuration cached inside hue SDK during runtime.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<PHGroup> getAllGroups()
      Returns current list of groups from bridge cache.

      Returns current list of lights from bridge cache.

      java.util.List<PHSchedule> getAllTimers(boolean areReccurring)

      Returns current bridge configuration from bridge cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getLights

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PHLight> getLights()
        Returns current list of lights from bridge cache. Lights can be accessible through their unique light identifier.
        Returns:
        the hash table where key contains light identifier and value contains PHLight object.

      • getAllLights

        java.util.List<PHLight> getAllLights()
        Returns current list of lights from bridge cache.
        Returns:
        an List of PHLight objects

      • getGroups

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PHGroup> getGroups()
        Returns current list of groups from bridge cache. Groups can be accessible through their unique light identifier.
        Returns:
        the hash table where key contains group identifier and value contains PHGroup object.

      • getAllGroups

        java.util.List<PHGroup> getAllGroups()
        Returns current list of groups from bridge cache.
        Returns:
        an List of PHGroup objects

      • getAllScenes

        java.util.List<PHScene> getAllScenes()
        Returns current list of scenes from bridge cache.
        Returns:
        an List of PHScene objects

      • getBridgeConfiguration

        PHBridgeConfiguration getBridgeConfiguration()
        Returns current bridge configuration from bridge cache.
        Returns:
        the PHBridgeConfiguration object.

      • getSchedules

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PHSchedule> getSchedules()
        Returns list of schedules from bridge cache. Schedules can be accessible through their unique schedule identifier.
        Returns:
        the hash table where key contains schedule identifier and value contains PHSchedule object.

      • getSensors

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PHSensor> getSensors()
        Returns list of sensors from bridge cache. Sensors can be accessible through their unique sensor identifier.
        Returns:
        the hash table where key contains sensor identifier and value contains PHSensor object.

      • getRules

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PHRule> getRules()
        Returns list of rules from bridge cache. Rules can be accessible through their unique rule identifier.
        Returns:
        the hash table where key contains rule identifier and value contains PHRule object.

      • getScenes

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PHScene> getScenes()
        Returns list of scene from bridge cache. Scene can be accessible through their unique scene identifier.
        Returns:
        the hash table where key contains scene identifier and value contains PHScene Object.

      • getAllSchedules

        java.util.List<PHSchedule> getAllSchedules(boolean areReccurring)
        Parameters:
        areReccurring - parameter indicates wither the schedules are recurring or not.
        Returns:
        a list of all Schedules
